attributes.action: prevent the building of the Borough Green International Gateway on Green Belt land
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Proposals have been submitted to build a Road-Rail Freight Interchange Depot on 265 acres of Green Belt land between the A227 and A20 in Kent. It is close to the rural villages of Wrotham, Borough Green and St Mary Platt. This is a misguided attempt to carpet beautiful countryside with an urban sprawl.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to prevent the building of the Borough Green International Gateway on Green Belt land.

Her Majesty's Government has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.hmg.gov.uk/epetition-responses/petition-view.aspx?epref=StopBIG


Her Majesty's Government
